name: Lansdale Reporter
title: Piaa 6a Baseball Lugaras 3 Hit Shutout Grattans Rbi Double Sends North Penn Past Neshaminy In State Semifinals

up for email newsletters Subscribe Log in E-Edition E-Edition High School Sports 76ers Eagles Flyers Phillies Union TRENDING: Montco primary election results **PIAA-6A BASEBALL: Lugara’s 3-hit shutout, Grattan’s RBI double sends North Penn past Neshaminy in state semifinals** **Share this:** Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window)Facebook Click to share on X (Opens in new window)X PLYMOUTH TWP. – Ben Grattan’s RBI double broke a scoreless tie in the bottom of the fourth inning while Trevor Lugara pitched a three-hit shutout as the North Penn ball team earned its first trip to the PIAA final since 2015 with a 1-0 victory over Neshaminy in the Class 6A semifinals Monday afternoon at Villanova Ballpark at Plymouth Township. **Share this:** Click to share on Facebook (Opens in
